name: Pérez the Mouse
overview: The Ratoncito Pérez (or Ratón Pérez, "Pérez Mouse" in English) is a figure popular in Spanish and Hispanic American cultures, similar to the Tooth Fairy. In this game, Pérez the mouse has to replace the teeth of sleeping children with some coins, but you must not be trapped in full action! Game submitted to the MSX-BASIC 2011 Contest organized by Konamito.
